## Why change?: 
- ## HTML   `r emo::ji("thinking")`

## What's wrong with:

- ## PDF  

- ## ePUB
]
.pull-right[
<img src="SUSSRdr.gif" width="80%">
]

???

PDF
- static, non-interactive, no-media
- doesn't render well on current mobile devices
- but printing is excellent because of fix format

ePUB
- initially "text" based (think Kindle)
- now bandwidth savings no longer critical issue
- videos and chunked-lessons are now externally sourced
- while good at rendering and interactivity, html can do more
- can include some server-side calls
- relys on local storage

HTML
- more consistent and wider range of rendering modes
- adaptable to wider range of devices
- needs to call internet mostly
- longer shelf life
- better development tools
- server-side applications
- server-side storage
